titleStmt.title: The remedie of schisme. Or, a mean to settle the divisions of the times. Set forth in a seasonable sermon before an honorable assembly in the City of London. By William Sclater, Batchelar in Divinitie, Preacher of Gods Word in the city of Exeter.
titleStmt.author: Sclater, William, 1609-1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Paine and M. Symmons, for Tho. Slater at the Swan in Duck-Lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
